pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mission_detail = #{missionDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
begin_date = #{beginDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
